ast.name: cloud paper scissors
ast.comment: Uses the cloud to provide real time matchmaking and gameplay of the classic game, Rock Paper Scissors. Test your luck against the world of opponents!

body.text: Check if both of them have moved
If there are no open games, create a new one
Returns a picture based on the name passed in

thenBody.text: Give the app half a second to sync with the cloud

qzEPtF0EfRU2oDL7w2ciR1ok.text: Execute this whenever there may have been some updates to cloud state
